entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is described as finding her sister Padma in the crowd. She leads Padma over to Harry and Ron.

entities.name: padma
entities.description: Padma is described as looking pretty in robes of bright turquoise, but not enthusiastic about having Ron as a partner.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present with Ron and Padma.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking around at the crowd and not enthusiastic about having Padma as a partner.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is described as passing by, looking stunning in robes of silver-gray satin.

entities.name: ravenclaw quidditch captain
entities.description: The Ravenclaw Quidditch captain is mentioned as accompanying Fleur Delacour.

relationships.description: Parvati finds her sister Padma in the crowd.
Parvati leads Padma over to Harry and Ron.
Fleur Delacour is accompanied by the Ravenclaw Quidditch captain.
Fleur Delacour passes by Parvati and her group.
